title: Add IRS SOI deduction targets (SALT, medical, real estate, QBI)
Add IRS SOI refundable CTC/ACTC targets
Expand SOI state ETL to all 50 states + DC
description: Current etl_soi_state.py only covers 5 states (CA, TX, FL, NY, PA). Expand to all 50 states + DC by downloading Historic Table 2 CSV files and adding complete FIPS mapping. See docs/data-sources/irs-soi-state.md for data source details.

title: Add state-level targets (SOI by state, state UI)
description:
State-level calibration targets for state-specific microsimulation.

Sources:
- SOI by state: https://www.irs.gov/statistics/soi-tax-stats-historic-table-2
- State unemployment insurance data
- State SNAP participation by state
- Census ACS state-level demographics

Enables state tax modeling and federalism analysis.

title: Add income by source targets from SOI AGI percentile data
description: Add targets for income by source (wages, interest, dividends, capital gains, business income, partnership/S-corp) using SOI AGI Percentile Data by State tables. Useful for validating income composition by state. See docs/data-sources/irs-soi-state.md.

title: Expand age distribution targets to 18 brackets (matching PE)
Expand IRS SOI state coverage to all 50 states + DC
Add ONS population/household projections for UK
description:
UK equivalent of Census projections.

Sources:
- ONS National Population Projections
- ONS Household Projections  
- Regional breakdowns

Complements existing HMRC/DWP historical data with forward-looking targets.

title: Add CPS monthly employment/unemployment targets
description:
Monthly CPS data for labor force statistics. More granular than annual BLS aggregates.

Sources:
- BLS CPS tables: https://www.bls.gov/cps/tables.htm
- Employment status by age, sex, race
- Unemployment rates
- Labor force participation

Updates monthly - good for near-real-time calibration.

title: Implement calibration pipeline using targets DB
description:
Use the targets database to actually reweight microdata.

Pipeline:
1. Load microdata (CPS/FRS)
2. Query targets for year/jurisdiction
3. Run entropy balancing or raking
4. Output calibrated weights

This is the core value prop - connecting targets to microdata.

title: Add AGI bracket stratification to SOI state ETL
description: Parse AGI bracket columns from Historic Table 2 CSV to create state x AGI bracket strata. This enables calibration to income distributions within each state. Create hierarchical strata: national -> state -> bracket. See docs/data-sources/irs-soi-state.md for bracket definitions.

title: Add healthcare insurance enrollment targets (ACA marketplace)
Add Medicaid enrollment targets (state and congressional district)
Add congressional district geographic level for targets
Implement microdata loader
Add IRS SOI income by source targets (interest, dividends, capital gains)
Add EITC and CTC state targets from SOI
description: Add EITC and Child Tax Credit/Additional Child Tax Credit state-level targets from SOI EITC statistics and State Data FY tables. Critical for validating refundable credit take-up in microsimulation. See docs/data-sources/irs-soi-state.md for source URLs.

title: Implement entropy calibration algorithm
Add IRS SOI EITC targets by number of children
Add SSI participation and benefit targets
